subject: College Athletics
Football
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Steve Spurrier is entering his third season as the coach at South Carolina, and his belief that the Gamecocks could become a force in the SEC is nearing a collision with reality.
snippet: Steve Spurrier is entering his third season as the coach at South Carolina, and his belief that the Gamecocks could become a force in the SEC is nearing a collision with reality.
